item.description:
The warm weather is coming and that means the market is picking up, and the old inventory of homes will be disappearing. What does this mean for you the investor? It means that the time to buy is now! Our June meetup will focus on the basics; Making offers. How to structure them, clauses and contingencies. Financing, Home Inspection and everything you need to know to get your offers accepted.
The presenter for this very informative meeting will be ....yours truly! That's right, just like in the old days I'm going to go over a standard offer form, discuss where to look for financing and show you how to get offers accepted.

So don't miss me, Peter Garian, Broker/Owner of ListRight Real Estate, and the informative June meeting of "MAKING OFFERS"

RSVP today!

Search for investment properties online at [url=http://www.ListRightRealEstate.com]http://ListRight... Real Estate

group.name: Metro West Investors - Boston area Real Estate Group

item.name: Metro West Investors - Boston area Real Estate Group Meetup
